verbs.description: [ARG0: Donald Trump] [V: lost] [ARG1: his mind] [ARGM-LOC: at the G7 summit] [ARGM-TMP: on Saturday] [ARGM-TMP: when he aggressively responded to the press , which prompted panelists on MSNBC ’s AM Joy to grow shocked by the president 's behavior] .
